#summary Introduction to project.

To properly use this program you first need to download and install several components.

= Required components =

  * [client application] installed on the phone (not yet on the market)
  * [server application] installed on a computer
  * [Julius] ASR engine (patched)
  * [acoustic models]

= Configuration and usage =

After you have installed all these programs, you need to configure the server to make it work. This process is two-fold:

  # You need to define what the system will recognize by compiling and activating [grammars].
  # You need to define how the system will react to recognized commands by writing appropriate [scripts].
